title: Your tools and how to use them: Hoover T-Series™ WindTunnel® Pet Bagged Upright UH30310(B)
description: Here we'll walk you through your on board tools and how to use them.

asset.author: Hoover
asset.hookText: Here we'll walk you through your on board tools and how to use them.

transcripts: To use the on-board tool attachments simply put the cleaner into the upright position. Depress the suction only mode pedal to turn off the brush roll during tool use. To remove the hose end simply press the release button. You can either connect the desired tool attachment on to the end of the hose, or use the extension wand for extra reach. There's a powered hand tool with an air driven brush roll for vacuuming upholstery and carpeted stairs. The dusting and upholstery brush can be used to remove hair and dust from upholstered furniture. The crevice tool is designed for cleaning in tight spaces. When you are finished using the tool attachments use the suction only mode foot pedal to turn the brush roll back on for vacuuming carpets.
